Job Title: Commercial Construction Estimator

Location: Richmond, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Engineering, Management

Description:
Overview:RMT Construction & Development Group is one of the fastest growing construction management firms in the Central Virginia region. RMT is one of the few construction firms in the area with a Commercial, Residential, Multi-Family, Commercial Interiors and 3D Printing division. RMT has worked with many of it's clientele for well over a decade, with teammates who have been with us, just a long. 
Position Overview:The Commercial Construction Estimator position is a very important role at RMT. Our estimators are responsible for seeking out new opportunities, estimating construction cost, creating competitive advantages and using a combination of skill and strategic trade partnerships to accurately budget the cost of construction projects. We have built a strong name in our industry based on superior performance and customer service. Join a company where you will be a part of a Team and not just a number. Ideal candidates will have strong commercial construction estimating experience, a strong trade and vendor network, be a self-starter, team player and be motivated with a strong work ethic.
Key Responsibilities:Complete project budgets and detailed estimates, including detailed quantity take-off and pricing for self performed trades.Perform scope assessments and prepare and issue Scope of Work to bidders.Establish bidder list for each project and issue bid invitations.Distribute bid documents to subs. Post bid documents in online Plan Room using SharePoint.Set up bid forms.Prepare preliminary schedule for bid purposes.Maintain record copy of bid documents.Prepare scope of work for each trade to be used in subcontracts.Prepare bid tabulation for each trade and recommendation for award.Conduct turn over meetings with Project Manager and Superintendent.Assist with Business Development proposals.Organize and prepare written proposals to clients including Letters of Interest, Qualification Statements, and Requests for Proposals.
Qualifications:BS degree in Engineering or Construction Management or related field (Preferred).5 -10 years in the lead role, estimating commercia new construction and renovations.Or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Knowledge, Skills & AbilitiesStrong technical and communication skills are criticalAbility to work in a team environmentProficiency in construction estimation software and tools (Bluebeam, Plan Swift, RS Means).Strong analytical skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.Attention to detailKnowledge of Procore, Microsoft Office (preferred)
Benefits:Competitive salary commensurate with experience.Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, retirement plans, & paid time off.Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.Collaborative and inclusive work environment.Opportunity for advancement
RMT is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, color, national origin, race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status, or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): None
